CreateDBDiagReportTask.document: This API is used to create a health report and send it via email as configured.
CreateDBDiagReportTask.name: Creates a health report generation task

CreateMailProfile.document: This API is used to create the email configuration. The input parameter `ProfileType` represents the type of the email configuration. Valid values: `dbScan_mail_configuration` (email configuration of database inspection report) and `scheduler_mail_configuration` (email configuration of scheduled task report).
CreateMailProfile.name: Creates email configuration

DescribeAllUserContact.document: This API is used to obtain the information of the contact in the email.
DescribeAllUserContact.name: Obtains information of the contact in the email

DescribeAllUserGroup.document: This API is used to obtain the information of the contact group in the email.
DescribeAllUserGroup.name: Obtains information of the contact group in the email

DescribeDBDiagEvent.document: This API is used to get the details of an instance exception diagnosis event.
DescribeDBDiagEvent.name: Gets diagnosis event details

DescribeDBDiagHistory.document: This API is used to get the list of instance diagnosis events.
DescribeDBDiagHistory.name: Gets instance diagnosis history

DescribeDBSpaceStatus.document: This API is used to query the overview of instance space usage during a specified time period, including disk usage growth (MB), available disk space (MB), total disk space (MB), and estimated number of available days.
DescribeDBSpaceStatus.name: Queries overview of instance space usage during a specified time period

DescribeSlowLogTimeSeriesStats.document: This API is used to get the slow log statistics histogram.
DescribeSlowLogTimeSeriesStats.name: Gets slow log statistics histogram

DescribeSlowLogTopSqls.document: This API is used to get and sort the top slow SQL statements in a specified time period by the aggregation mode of SQL template plus schema.
DescribeSlowLogTopSqls.name: Queries slow log statistics in specified time period by SQL template

DescribeTopSpaceTableTimeSeries.document: This API is used to query the daily space data of top tables consuming the most instance space. The data is daily collected by DBbrain during a specified time period. The return results are sorted by size by default.
DescribeTopSpaceTableTimeSeries.name: Queries daily space statistics of top tables during a specified time period

DescribeTopSpaceTables.document: This API is used to query real-time space statistics of top tables of an instance. The return results are sorted by size by default.
DescribeTopSpaceTables.name: Queries space statistics of top tables

ModifyDiagDBInstanceConf.document: This API is used to enable/disable instance inspection.
ModifyDiagDBInstanceConf.name: Enables/disables instance inspection

members.document: The email address of the contact.
members.name: Mail

members.document: Whether to send an email. Valid values: 0 - Yes, 1 - No.
members.name: SendMailFlag

members.document: An array of contact IDs to receive the email.
members.name: ContactPerson

members.document: An array of contact group IDs to receive the email.
members.name: ContactGroup

members.document: Service type. Valid values: `mysql` (TencentDB for MySQL), `cynosdb` (TencentDB for CynosDB (compatible with MySQL)). Default value: `mysql`.
members.name: Product

members.document:
ID of an async task request, which can be used to query the execution result of an async task.
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.
members.name: AsyncRequestId

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Configuration level. Valid values: "User" (user-level), "Instance" (instance-level). For database inspection report, it should be `User`; and for scheduled task reports, it should be `Instance`.
members.name: ProfileLevel

members.document: Configuration name, which needs to be unique. For database inspection reports, this name can be customize as needed. For scheduled task reports, the name should be in the format of "scheduler_" + {instanceId}, such as "schduler_cdb-test".
members.name: ProfileName

members.document: Configuration type. Valid values: "dbScan_mail_configuration" (email configuration of database inspection report), "scheduler_mail_configuration" (email configuration of scheduled task report).
members.name: ProfileType

members.document: Service type. Valid values: `mysql` (TencentDB for MySQL), `cynosdb` (TencentDB for CynosDB (compatible with MySQL)).
members.name: Product

members.document: Instance ID bound to the configuration, which is required when the configuration level is `Instance`.
members.name: BindInstanceIds

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Service type. Valid values: `mysql` (TencentDB for MySQL), `cynosdb` (TencentDB for CynosDB (compatible with MySQL)).
members.name: Product

members.document: An array of contact name. Fuzzy search is supported.
members.name: Names

members.document:
Contact information.
Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.
members.name: Contacts

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

members.document: Service type. Valid values: `mysql` (TencentDB for MySQL), `cynosdb` (TencentDB for CynosDB (compatible with MySQL)).
members.name: Product

members.document: Service type. Valid values: `mysql` (TencentDB for MySQL), `cynosdb` (TencentDB for CynosDB (compatible with MySQL)). Default value: `mysql`.
members.name: Product

members.document: Severity, which can be divided into 5 levels: 1: fatal, 2: severe, 3: warning, 4: notice, 5: healthy.

members.name: Product

members.name: RequestId

members.document: Query period in days. The end date is the current date and the query period is 7 days by default.
members.name: RangeDays

members.document: Service type. Valid values: `mysql` (TencentDB for MySQL), `cynosdb` (TencentDB for CynosDB (compatible with MySQL)). Default value: `mysql`.
members.name: Product

members.name: OrderBy

members.name: Limit

members.document: Field used to sort top tables. Valid values: DataLength, IndexLength, TotalLength, DataFree, FragRatio, TableRows, PhysicalFileSize. Default value: PhysicalFileSize.
members.name: SortBy

members.document: Start date. It can be as early as 29 days before the current date, and defaults to 6 days before the end date.
members.name: StartDate

members.document: End date. It can be as early as 29 days before the current date, and defaults to the current date.
members.name: EndDate

members.name: Limit

members.name: SortBy

members.document: Service type. Valid values: `mysql` (TencentDB for MySQL), `cynosdb` (TencentDB for CynosDB (compatible with MySQL)). Default value: `mysql`.
